full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL GSANG BA'I BDAG PO'I GTOR 'BUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RANG GI SLOB MA DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, AER TE NI MER GEN @003B PAndI TA RGYAL KHANG TZE HU THOG THU ZHES 'BOD PA, BLO BZANG BDE MCHOG DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI THONG LAG PI LIG THU BLO BZANG SBYIN PA 'PHRIN LAS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BDE MCHOG DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB,
